actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt full-time students serving as resident assistants and resident counselors in private nonprofit institutions of higher education from that Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt full-time students serving as resident assistants and resident counselors in a dormitory of an institution of higher education from the provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt full-time students serving as resident assistants and resident counselors in private nonprofit institutions of higher education from that Act, and for other purposes.
